meta_description: Guided by artists, rooted in New Mexico, SITE SANTA FE celebrates contemporary creative expression.
hours_text:
PLAN YOUR VISIT

# Exhibition Space Closed

SITE SANTA FE exhibition spaces will reopen June 5, 2026, with the landmark exhibition _Indian Theater: Native Performance, Art, and Self-Determination since 1969_ , curated by Candice Hopkins.

While the galleries are temporarily closed, SITE SANTA FE is very much active. Stay connected by following us on Instagram and Facebook and subscribing to our newsletter for updates, announcements, and upcoming programs.

**  
On-site**

  * **The Bookstore is open daily** , 11 AM–4 PM

  * Coffee and snacks available in the lobby daily, 11 AM–4 PM

  * The always-popular **Members Exhibition Preview** takes place in March

  * Additional educational and community events will be announced as renovations allow

**  
Off-site & Online**

  * Young Curators exhibition opens February 27, 2026 at Zane Bennett Contemporary

  * Watch our Artist Talks and Curator Talks featuring some of the leading figures in the contemporary art world on our [YouTube channel](https://www.youtube.com/@sitesantafe)

  * Listen to the free digital Audio Guide on [Bloomberg Connects](https://guides.bloombergconnects.org/en-US/guide/siteSantaFe)—no app download or subscription necessary!

  * Explore past exhibitions on our website

  * Subscribe to our weekly newsletter (no spam, we promise)

  * Follow us on social media @sitesantafe

PLAN YOUR VISIT

admission_text:
## Individual

$50

  * Invitations to Members-only events, including monthly Member Mornings, Annual Exhibition Preview, and the Annual Members Party

  * Free Ohori’s coffee on weekends

  * Free Public Program tickets

  * 10% off all onsite purchases

  * Monthly digital Membership newsletter

  * Free parking in the City Railyard Municipal Garage

  * SITE SANTA FE sticker with your membership card

[JOIN](https://19674.blackbaudhosting.com/19674/Membership)
